column4: i'm trying to figure out why i can't ssh into my box.  i can ssh into 192.168.0.3 (my IP address)... but i cant ssh into 97.113.54.66.... a QWEST assigned IP address.  (i've even tryied telnet 97.113.54.66 22 and gotten =< Unable to connect; connection timed out).  i'm plugged directly from qwest modem into my computer.  questions: 1) isn't this qwest's fault?  2) how do i view the log of the sshd server?  thanks
port forwading for your router, or set you 0.3 as DMZ
huh?  there is no router i'm plugged directly into their dsl modem
i didnt get to set the ip address
